This is a project by Sunith Vallabhaneni analyzing data on books on the website
[Goodreads](https://goodreads.com/). 


It uses a dataset from [Kaggle](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/mdhamani/goodreads-books-100k), which contains the book title, author, genre, book format, number of reviews, average review score, and page count.
